Class RangeCircle

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • RangeCircle

  • public class RangeCircle
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Checks location of mouse when clicking and menu added to determine if the menu was clicked and if it needs to be removed. The tower sends itself to the radius so that the menus are customizable based on the tower type.
    Version:
    January 16th 2019
    Author:
    Kevin Biro
